about_the_game:
The Crush Your Enemies "Plundered Loot" DLC comes with all of the following titillating extra content:

- Full Battle Soundtrack which was mastered and composed by celebrated Composer Marcin Przybylowicz (The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt).
- Badass Wallpapers
- Hardcore Artworks
- Printable Goodies
detailed_description:
The Crush Your Enemies "Plundered Loot" DLC comes with all of the following titillating extra content:

- Full Battle Soundtrack which was mastered and composed by celebrated Composer Marcin Przybylowicz (The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt).
- Badass Wallpapers
- Hardcore Artworks
- Printable Goodies

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel from 1.2 GHz or equivilent AMD family
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 110 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or Later
  • Processor: Intel from 1.2 GHz or equivilent AMD family
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 110 MB available space

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: The Crush Your Enemies "Plundered Loot" DLC contains a collection of additional goodies that any Barbarian would be proud to pillage from nearby villages.
